LanguageData.VRE_LowHemogenDrain.label: low hemogen drain
LanguageData.VRE_LowHemogenDrain.description: Carriers lose an additional 4 hemogen per day from biological entropy.
LanguageData.VRE_ExtremeHemogenDrain.label: extreme hemogen drain
LanguageData.VRE_ExtremeHemogenDrain.description: Carriers lose an additional 12 hemogen per day from biological entropy.
